EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Reminder - Chicago
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]> We will see you tomorrow for the Cloud Native Workshop!
Event details below: Date: March 29, 2016 Time: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM
Location: EMC 353 North Clark St Floor 19 Room TR-106 - WINDY CITY A Chicago, IL 60654
Please email Jignesh Sheth at jsheth@pivotal.io <[[http://info.pivotal.io/qhJI0C12Nw0Abj02U0j500Y]]> with any questions.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
